verses.verse: וְאַבְרָהָ֣ם <S%H85><s%> And Abraham זָקֵ֔ן <S%H2204><s%> was old בָּ֖א <S%H935><s%> [and] well stricken בַּיָּמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> in age וַֽיהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD בֵּרַ֥ךְ <S%H1288><s%> had blessed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַבְרָהָ֖ם <S%H85><s%> Abraham בַּכֹּֽל׃ <S%H3605><s%> every

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אַבְרָהָ֗ם <S%H85><s%> And Abraham אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his עַבְדּוֹ֙ <S%H5650><s%> servant זְקַ֣ן <S%H2205><s%> unto his eldest בֵּית֔וֹ <S%H1004><s%> of his house הַמֹּשֵׁ֖ל <S%H4910><s%> that ruled over בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after ל֑וֹ שִֽׂים־ <S%H7760><s%> all that he had Put נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> Please יָדְךָ֖ <S%H3027><s%> I pray thee thy hand תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> under יְרֵכִֽי׃ <S%H3409><s%> under my thigh

וְאַשְׁבִּ֣יעֲךָ֔ <S%H7650><s%> And I will make thee swear בַּֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> by the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> the God הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven וֵֽאלֹהֵ֖י <S%H430><s%> and the God הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> whom לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> you shall not תִקַּ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> that thou shalt not take אִשָּׁה֙ <S%H802><s%> a wife לִבְנִ֔י <S%H1121><s%> unto my son מִבְּנוֹת֙ <S%H1323><s%> of the daughters הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֔י <S%H3669><s%> of the Canaanites אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom אָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> I יוֹשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> whom I dwell בְּקִרְבּֽוֹ׃ <S%H7130><s%> among

כִּ֧י <S%H3588><s%> for אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַרְצִ֛י <S%H776><s%> unto my country וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to מוֹלַדְתִּ֖י <S%H4138><s%> and to my kindred תֵּלֵ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> will go וְלָקַחְתָּ֥ <S%H3947><s%> and take אִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> a wife לִבְנִ֥י <S%H1121><s%> unto my son לְיִצְחָֽק׃ <S%H3327><s%> Isaac

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> about הָעֶ֔בֶד <S%H5650><s%> And the servant אוּלַי֙ <S%H194><s%> Suppose לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> is not תֹאבֶ֣ה <S%H14><s%> will not be willing הָֽאִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> unto him Peradventure the woman לָלֶ֥כֶת <S%H1980><s%> along אַחֲרַ֖י <S%H310><s%> me אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> unto this land הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> I הֶֽהָשֵׁ֤ב <S%H7725><s%> must I needs bring אָשִׁיב֙ <S%H7725><s%> again אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּנְךָ֔ <S%H1121><s%> thy son אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> unto the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> thou יָצָ֥אתָ <S%H3318><s%> from whence thou camest מִשָּֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> in it

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> then אַבְרָהָ֑ם <S%H85><s%> And Abraham הִשָּׁ֣מֶר <S%H8104><s%> unto him Beware לְךָ֔ פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> not תָּשִׁ֥יב <S%H7725><s%> thither again אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנִ֖י <S%H1121><s%> my son שָֽׁמָּה׃ <S%H8033><s%> there

יְהוָ֣ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God הַשָּׁמַ֗יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who לְקָחַ֜נִי <S%H3947><s%> which took me מִבֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house אָבִי֮ <S%H1><s%> from my father's וּמֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and from the land מֽוֹלַדְתִּי֒ <S%H4138><s%> of my kindred וַאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> and who דִּבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> and which spake לִ֜י וַאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> and who נִֽשְׁבַּֽע־ <S%H7650><s%> unto me and that sware לִי֙ לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> unto me saying לְזַ֨רְעֲךָ֔ <S%H2233><s%> Unto thy seed אֶתֵּ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> will I give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> this land הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> likewise ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יִשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> he shall send מַלְאָכוֹ֙ <S%H4397><s%> his angel לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <S%H6440><s%> before thee וְלָקַחְתָּ֥ <S%H3947><s%> and thou shalt take אִשָּׁ֛ה <S%H802><s%> a wife לִבְנִ֖י <S%H1121><s%> unto my son מִשָּֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> there

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if לֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> is not תֹאבֶ֤ה <S%H14><s%> will not be willing הָֽאִשָּׁה֙ <S%H802><s%> And if the woman לָלֶ֣כֶת <S%H1980><s%> along אַחֲרֶ֔יךָ <S%H310><s%> thee וְנִקִּ֕יתָ <S%H5352><s%> then thou shalt be clear מִשְּׁבֻעָתִ֖י <S%H7621><s%> from this my oath זֹ֑את <S%H2063><s%> likewise רַ֣ק <S%H7535><s%> but אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנִ֔י <S%H1121><s%> not my son לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תָשֵׁ֖ב <S%H7725><s%> thither again שָֽׁמָּה׃ <S%H8033><s%> there

וַיָּ֤שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> put הָעֶ֙בֶד֙ <S%H5650><s%> And the servant אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָד֔וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand תַּ֛חַת <S%H8478><s%> under יֶ֥רֶךְ <S%H3409><s%> under the thigh אַבְרָהָ֖ם <S%H85><s%> of Abraham אֲדֹנָ֑יו <S%H113><s%> his master וַיִּשָּׁ֣בַֽע <S%H7650><s%> and sware ל֔וֹ עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> to him concerning הַדָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> matter הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> that

וַיִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> took הָ֠עֶבֶד <S%H5650><s%> And the servant עֲשָׂרָ֨ה <S%H6235><s%> ten גְמַלִּ֜ים <S%H1581><s%> camels מִגְּמַלֵּ֤י <S%H1581><s%> of the camels אֲדֹנָיו֙ <S%H113><s%> of his master וַיֵּ֔לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> and set וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> A variety ט֥וּב <S%H2898><s%> for all the goods אֲדֹנָ֖יו <S%H113><s%> of his master בְּיָד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> [were] in his hand וַיָּ֗קָם <S%H6965><s%> and he arose וַיֵּ֛לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> and went אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֲרַ֥ם נַֽהֲרַ֖יִם <S%H763><s%> to Mesopotamia אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> unto the city נָחֽוֹר׃ <S%H5152><s%> of Nahor

וַיַּבְרֵ֧ךְ <S%H1288><s%> to kneel down הַגְּמַלִּ֛ים <S%H1581><s%> his camels מִח֥וּץ <S%H2351><s%> without לָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> the city אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> by בְּאֵ֣ר <S%H875><s%> a well הַמָּ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> of water לְעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> at the time עֶ֔רֶב <S%H6153><s%> of the evening לְעֵ֖ת <S%H6256><s%> [even] the time צֵ֥את <S%H3318><s%> that women go out הַשֹּׁאֲבֹֽת׃ <S%H7579><s%> to draw

וַיֹּאמַ֓ר ׀ <S%H559><s%> And he said יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אֱלֹהֵי֙ <S%H430><s%> God אֲדֹנִ֣י <S%H113><s%> of my master אַבְרָהָ֔ם <S%H85><s%> Abraham הַקְרֵה־ <S%H7136><s%> good speed נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> please לְפָנַ֖י <S%H6440><s%> I pray thee send me הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> this day וַעֲשֵׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> and shew חֶ֕סֶד <S%H2617><s%> kindness עִ֖ם <S%H5973><s%> unto אֲדֹנִ֥י <S%H113><s%> my master אַבְרָהָֽם׃ <S%H85><s%> Abraham

הִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> I נִצָּ֖ב <S%H5324><s%> Behold I stand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by עֵ֣ין <S%H5869><s%> [here] by the well הַמָּ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> of water וּבְנוֹת֙ <S%H1323><s%> and the daughters אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H376><s%> of the men הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> of the city יֹצְאֹ֖ת <S%H3318><s%> come out לִשְׁאֹ֥ב <S%H7579><s%> to draw מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> water

וְהָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> now may it be that הַֽנַּעֲרָ֗ <S%H5291><s%> And let it come to pass that the damsel אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> to whom אֹמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> to whom I shall say אֵלֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H413><s%> about הַטִּי־ <S%H5186><s%> Let down נָ֤א <S%H4994><s%> Please כַדֵּךְ֙ <S%H3537><s%> thy pitcher וְאֶשְׁתֶּ֔ה <S%H8354><s%> I pray thee that I may drink וְאָמְרָ֣ה <S%H559><s%> and she shall say שְׁתֵ֔ה <S%H8354><s%> Drink וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> again גְּמַלֶּ֖יךָ <S%H1581><s%> thy camels אַשְׁקֶ֑ה <S%H8248><s%> drink אֹתָ֤הּ <S%H853><s%> הֹכַ֙חְתָּ֙ <S%H3198><s%> also [let the same be] she [that] thou hast appointed לְעַבְדְּךָ֣ <S%H5650><s%> for thy servant לְיִצְחָ֔ק <S%H3327><s%> Isaac וּבָ֣הּ אֵדַ֔ע <S%H3045><s%> and thereby shall I know כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> that עָשִׂ֥יתָ <S%H6213><s%> that thou hast shewed חֶ֖סֶד <S%H2617><s%> kindness עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אֲדֹנִֽי׃ <S%H113><s%> unto my master

וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> become ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he טֶרֶם֮ <S%H2962><s%> Before כִּלָּ֣ה <S%H3615><s%> And it came to pass before he had done לְדַבֵּר֒ <S%H1696><s%> speaking וְהִנֵּ֧ה <S%H2009><s%> behold רִבְקָ֣ה <S%H7259><s%> that behold Rebekah יֹצֵ֗את <S%H3318><s%> came out אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who יֻלְּדָה֙ <S%H3205><s%> was born לִבְתוּאֵ֣ל <S%H1328><s%> to Bethuel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> son מִלְכָּ֔ה <S%H4435><s%> of Milcah אֵ֥שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> the wife נָח֖וֹר <S%H5152><s%> of Nahor אֲחִ֣י <S%H251><s%> brother אַבְרָהָ֑ם <S%H85><s%> Abraham's וְכַדָּ֖הּ <S%H3537><s%> with her pitcher עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on שִׁכְמָֽהּ׃ <S%H7926><s%> upon her shoulder

וְהַֽנַּעֲרָ֗ <S%H5291><s%> And the damsel טֹבַ֤ת <S%H2896><s%> fair מַרְאֶה֙ <S%H4758><s%> to look upon מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> [was] very בְּתוּלָ֕ה <S%H1330><s%> a virgin וְאִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> neither had any man לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and no יְדָעָ֑הּ <S%H3045><s%> known וַתֵּ֣רֶד <S%H3381><s%> her and she went down הָעַ֔יְנָה <S%H5869><s%> to the well וַתְּמַלֵּ֥א <S%H4390><s%> and filled כַדָּ֖הּ <S%H3537><s%> her pitcher וַתָּֽעַל׃ <S%H5927><s%> and came up

וַיָּ֥רָץ <S%H7323><s%> ran הָעֶ֖בֶד <S%H5650><s%> And the servant לִקְרָאתָ֑הּ <S%H7125><s%> to meet her וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said הַגְמִיאִ֥ינִי <S%H1572><s%> Let me I pray thee drink נָ֛א <S%H4994><s%> Please מְעַט־ <S%H4592><s%> a little מַ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> water מִכַּדֵּֽךְ׃ <S%H3537><s%> of thy pitcher

וַתֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And she said שְׁתֵ֣ה <S%H8354><s%> Drink אֲדֹנִ֑י <S%H113><s%> my lord וַתְּמַהֵ֗ר <S%H4116><s%> and she hasted וַתֹּ֧רֶד <S%H3381><s%> and let down כַּדָּ֛הּ <S%H3537><s%> her pitcher עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto יָדָ֖הּ <S%H3027><s%> upon her hand וַתַּשְׁקֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H8248><s%> and gave him drink

וַתְּכַ֖ל <S%H3615><s%> And when she had done לְהַשְׁקֹת֑וֹ <S%H8248><s%> giving him drink וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> she said גַּ֤ם <S%H1571><s%> also לִגְמַלֶּ֙יךָ֙ <S%H1581><s%> [water] for thy camels אֶשְׁאָ֔ב <S%H7579><s%> I will draw עַ֥ד <S%H5704><s%> against אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo כִּלּ֖וּ <S%H3615><s%> also until they have done לִשְׁתֹּֽת׃ <S%H8354><s%> drinking

וַתְּמַהֵ֗ר <S%H4116><s%> And she hasted וַתְּעַ֤ר <S%H6168><s%> and emptied כַּדָּהּ֙ <S%H3537><s%> her pitcher אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הַשֹּׁ֔קֶת <S%H8268><s%> into the trough וַתָּ֥רָץ <S%H7323><s%> and ran ע֛וֹד <S%H5750><s%> back אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַבְּאֵ֖ר <S%H875><s%> again unto the well לִשְׁאֹ֑ב <S%H7579><s%> to draw וַתִּשְׁאַ֖ב <S%H7579><s%> [water] and drew לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all גְּמַלָּֽיו׃ <S%H1581><s%> for all his camels
